---
title: GetAuthRequired
description: Tells the client if authentication is required. If so, returns authentication parameters challenge and salt.
published: true
date: 2022-06-29T14:58:15.525Z
tags: 
editor: markdown
dateCreated: 2022-06-28T20:01:18.573Z
---

# GetAuthRequired

## Example
```json
{
"request-type": "GetAuthRequired"
}
```
## Request Fields
> No request fields required.
{.is-success}



## Variables
| Variable | Type | Description |
|---------:|:----:|:------------|
| `obsRaw.authRequired` | <kbd>boolean</kbd> | Indicates whether authentication is required.
| `obsRaw.status` | <kbd>string</kbd> | The status of the OBS raw sub-action
| `obsEvent._json` | <kbd>string</kbd> | Everything above in a json format

{.is-info}
